assessments.status_rationale: As of 2026-02-02, reporting indicates a partial government shutdown is still ongoing (e.g., delayed jobs report; House hardliners complicating an end). The prediction’s deadline (2026-02-04 UTC) has not yet passed, and there is no evidence of enacted funding and an OMB/OPM reopening announcement.
No items in today’s news bullets report Oracle pricing/closing ≥$20B of new debt financing in 2026 for AI/data-center expansion; the deadline is 2026-12-31.
No bullet indicates CISA has issued an alert/advisory explicitly referencing a Notepad++ distribution/update-channel hijack/compromise; deadline is 2026-03-31.

While there is mention of unusual trading dynamics/volatility in silver markets, there is no cited CME notice increasing initial margins by ≥10% for COMEX gold or silver futures. Deadline is 2026-02-28.
No news bullet reports an automaker/battery maker canceling/pausing/delaying by ≥6 months an EV/battery project in the specified U.S. South states; deadline is 2026-06-30.
No bullet indicates AstraZeneca announced and confirmed a NYSE primary listing (beyond ADR/OTC). Deadline is 2026-12-31.

Today’s news references India offering long-term tax breaks to attract AI/data-center investment, but it does not establish that an official Gazette notification (or equivalent statutory instrument) has implemented a zero-tax/tax-holiday regime specifically targeting AI compute/data-center workloads as defined in the prediction. Confirmation would require the actual statutory instrument and its terms.

No bullet describes a U.S. House standing committee requesting documents or opening an inquiry explicitly about foreign investment (e.g., UAE-linked) in the Trump family crypto venture 'World Liberty' (or equivalent). Deadline is 2026-09-30.
No bullet reports the EU adopting a new Russia-related sanctions package adding ≥50 new listings; deadline is 2026-06-30.
No bullet indicates WHO published a DON/technical brief/press note explicitly referencing the newly reported bat virus infecting humans; deadline is 2026-12-31.
